price: All that is in the heavens and all that is on earth glorifies Allah, for He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
arabic: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
